pullrequest.title: Reduce average shot turnaround time by 0.625 seconds

content.raw: Hmm, there seem to be 6 instances of `result` now between lines 598 and 610 in queue.py, but the first 3 are for one thing and the second 3 are for another. Can I suggest we fix that as well with a variable rename for 3 of the 6 instances?
content.html: Hmm, there seem to be 6 instances of result now between lines 598 and 610 in queue.py, but the first 3 are for one thing and the second 3 are for another. Can I suggest we fix that as well with a variable rename for 3 of the 6 instances?
